ValidationRule.description: Comments field is mandatory when Status is Exemption, Reduction or Deferral
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Exemption'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Reduction'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Deferral'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Go Early') ), OR( ISBLANK(Comments__c) ) )
